content.rendered:
Directed by Anu Menon

Written by Nayanika Mahtani. Ishita Moitra. Anu Menon. Nayanika Mahtani

Cast Vidya Balan (Shakuntala Devi). Adi Chugh (Kartar). Sanya Malhotra (Anupama Banerji). Jisshu Sengupta (Paritosh Banerji (as Jishu Sengupta)). Amit Sadh (Ajay Abhaya Kumar). Luca Calvani (Javier). Sheeba Chaddha (Tarabai). Prakash Belawadi (Shakuntala’s Father). Ipshita Chakraborty Singh (Shakuntala’s Mother). Spandan Chaturvedi (12 year old Shakuntala). Purnendu Bhattacharya (Ajay’s Father). Mark Davis (Steven). Renuka Sharma (Ajay’s Mother). Ahan Nirban (Srinivas). Jiya Shah (Sharada). Chahat Tewani (11 year old Anu). Priya Raina (Radhika). Komal Chhabria (Jaya). Barnaby Jago (English Presenter). Claire Ashton (Tea Room Lady). Ian Bailey (The Mediator). Santosh Banerjee (Gordhanbhai). Nicholas Blatt (Butler). Saulius Cajauskas (Maths Professor / Spanish Embassy Man). Suki Chott (Book Fan). Jake Francis (Anu’s Lawyer). Stephen Hulse (BBC TV Director).Elle Jones. Louis Mackenzie (Spanish Diplomat). Marianne March (Barbara Jensen). Faizz Mir (Extra). Amore Psiche (Spanish Embassy Woman). Nisha Aaliya (Bookshop Interviewer (uncredited)). Alex Bartram (Edward (uncredited)). Toni Beard (Yea room lady (uncredited)). Kiara Bhanushali (2 year old Anu (uncredited)). Raghav Binani (Arun’s Friend (uncredited)). Paul Blackwell (Mathematician (uncredited)). Colin Blyth (Royal mathematician society member (uncredited)). Nishit Broker (Lifetime Achievement Award Presenter (uncredited)). Barnaby Chambers (English Mathematician (uncredited)). Darren Charman (Man with stopwatch (uncredited)). Bradley Clarkson (Pub Owner (uncredited)). Robert Dalgleish (Lawyer (uncredited)). Ishita Deshmukh (Anu’s Friend 1 (uncredited)). Dhruvin Doshi (Arun (uncredited)). Max Dowler (BBC Show Host (uncredited)). Guinevere Edwards (Maid (uncredited)). Vidyuth Gargi (Mohan Manhas (uncredited)). Amitabh Gupta (Mathematics Teacher 2 (uncredited)). Keith Hide (Professor Allen (uncredited)). Ty Hurley (Mathematician (uncredited)). Martin Jishil (Agent (uncredited)). Nyla Masood (Doctor (uncredited)). Peter McPherson (London Presenter (uncredited)). Michael Meehan (English Man (uncredited)). Taraash Mehrotra (Ejaz (uncredited)). Araina Nand (8 year old Shakuntala (uncredited)). Roderick O’Grady (Theatre Director (uncredited)). Hannah-Lee Osborn (Teacher 1950’s (uncredited)). Mahesh Pillai (School Principal (uncredited)). Phillip Roy (Mr. Stevens – Shakuntala’s Lawyer (uncredited)). Vikram Sahu (Mr. Saxena (uncredited)). Stephen Samson (Mathematician (uncredited)). Rheanne Tejani (Anu’s Friend 2 (uncredited)). Girish Thapar (Stuffy Man 1 (uncredited)). Mahshid Torkan (Journalist (uncredited)). Reynu Verma (Principal (uncredited)). Jon Wennington (Mathematician (uncredited)). Jason Wilson (American Presenter (uncredited)). Jason Wilson (American Presenter (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Pearl Gill. Mrunalini Havaldar. Naman Jain. Seher Latif. Vikram Malhotra. Sheel Nimbalkar. Shivani Saran. Shikhaa Sharma. Adi Sharmaa. Raedita Tandan

Production Abundantia Entertainment. Genius Film. Sony Pictures Networks Production
